choices.B: Copy SA-IndexCreation to the etc/apps directory on the index cluster master node.
choices.C: Extract installer package into etc/apps directory of the cluster deployer node.
choices.D: Extract ITSI app package into etc/apps directory of search head.

questions.question_text: When installing ITSI to support a Distributed Search Architecture, which of the following items apply? (Choose all that apply.)
Which of the following is a valid type of Multi-KPI Alert?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
In some cases, you may decide to assign specific entities to services
• Example: a set of servers that is dedicated to online sales
• These entities would be defined in ITSI and assigned to the service via entity rules
Could someone please verify the accuracy of this answer

choices.D: If the intention is for the KPIs in the service to have different aggregate vs. entity KPI values.
choices.B: To enable entity cohesion anomaly detection.
choices.C: If some or all of the KPIs in the service will be split by entity.
choices.A: If the intention is for the KPIs in the service to filter to only entities assigned to the service.

questions.question_text: When must a service define entity rules?
When in maintenance mode, which of the following is accurate?

choices.B: KPIs are shown in blue while in maintenance mode.
choices.C: Maintenance mode slots are scheduled on a per hour basis.
choices.A: Once the window is over, KPIs and notable events will begin to be generated again.
choices.D: Service health scores and KPI events are deleted until the window is over.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a best practice when configuring maintenance windows?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Best practice: schedule maintenance windows about 15 to 30 minutes before and after actual maintenance work

choices.B: Develop a strategy for configuring a service’s notable event generation when the service’s maintenance window is open.
choices.C: Give the maintenance window a buffer, for example, 15 minutes before and after actual maintenance work.
choices.A: Disable any glass tables that reference a KPI that is part of an open maintenance window.
choices.D: Change the color of services and entities that are part of an open maintenance window in the service analyzer.
